<P class="p24 ft2">Regeringens fÃ¶rslag:</P>
<P class="p25 ft6"><SPAN class="ft2">1.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft11">Riksdagen godkÃ¤nner protokollet undertecknat den 16 maj 2019 om Ã¤ndring i avtalet mellan Konungariket Sverige och Portugisiska Republiken fÃ¶r undvikande av dubbelbeskattning och fÃ¶rhindrande av skatteflykt betrÃ¤ffande skatter pÃ¥ inkomst.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p26 ft7"><SPAN class="ft2">2.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft12">Riksdagen antar regeringens fÃ¶rslag till lag om Ã¤ndring i lagen (2003:758) om skatteavtal mellan Sverige och Portugal.</SPAN></P>

<P class="p28 ft1"><SPAN class="ft13">Prop. 2019/20:5 </SPAN>2 FÃ¶rslag till lag om Ã¤ndring i lagen</P>
<P class="p29 ft14">(2003:758) om skatteavtal mellan Sverige och Portugal</P>
<P class="p30 ft4">HÃ¤rigenom fÃ¶reskrivs att 1 Â§ och bilagan till lagen (2003:758) om skatteavtal mellan Sverige och Portugal ska ha fÃ¶ljande lydelse.</P>
<TABLE cellpadding=0 cellspacing=0 class="t5">
<TR>
	<TD class="tr6 td19"><SPAN class="p14 ft3">Nuvarande lydelse</SPAN> </TD>
	<TD class="tr6 td20"><SPAN class="p14 ft15">FÃ¶reslagen lydelse</SPAN> </TD>

</TABLE>
<P class="p31 ft2">1 Â§</P>
</DIV>
<DIV id="id_2">
<DIV id="id_2_1">
<P class="p32 ft16">Det avtal fÃ¶r undvikande av dubbelbeskattning och fÃ¶rhindrande av skatteflykt betrÃ¤ffande skatter pÃ¥ inkomst som Sverige och Portugal undertecknade den 29 augusti 2002 <SPAN class="ft15">skall </SPAN>gÃ¤lla som lag hÃ¤r i landet. Avtalet Ã¤r avfattat pÃ¥ svenska, portugisiska och engelska. Den svenska och engelska texten framgÃ¥r av <SPAN class="ft15">bilaga </SPAN>till denna lag.</P>
</DIV>
<DIV id="id_2_2">
<P class="p32 ft2">Det avtal fÃ¶r undvikande av dubbelbeskattning och fÃ¶rhindrande av skatteflykt betrÃ¤ffande skatter pÃ¥ inkomst som Sverige och Portugal undertecknade den 29 augusti 2002<SPAN class="ft3">, i den lydelse som detta har genom det protokoll om Ã¤ndring som undertecknades den 16 maj 2019, ska </SPAN>gÃ¤lla som lag hÃ¤r i landet. Avtalet Ã¤r avfattat pÃ¥ svenska, portugisiska och engelska. Den svenska och <SPAN class="ft3">den </SPAN>engelska texten framgÃ¥r av <SPAN class="ft3">bilagan </SPAN>till denna lag.</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV id="id_3">
<P class="p33 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">1.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft17">Denna lag trÃ¤der i kraft den dag som regeringen bestÃ¤mmer.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p34 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">2.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft17">Lagen tillÃ¤mpas fÃ¶rsta gÃ¥ngen i frÃ¥ga om</SPAN></P>
<P class="p35 ft6"><SPAN class="ft2">a)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft18">kÃ¤llskatter, pÃ¥ belopp som betalas eller tillgodofÃ¶rs den 1 januari det Ã¥r som fÃ¶ljer nÃ¤rmast efter den dag dÃ¥ lagen trÃ¤der i kraft eller senare,</SPAN></P>
<P class="p36 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">b)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft17">andra skatter pÃ¥ inkomst, pÃ¥ skatt som tas ut fÃ¶r beskattningsÃ¥r som bÃ¶rjar den 1 januari det Ã¥r som fÃ¶ljer nÃ¤rmast efter den dag dÃ¥ lagen trÃ¤der i kraft eller senare, och</SPAN></P>

<DIV id="id_2_2">

<P class="p53 ft6"><SPAN class="ft2">(iv)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft18">The income tax on nonresident artistes and athletes (den sÃ¤rskilda inkomstskatten fÃ¶r utomlands bosatta artister m.fl.),</SPAN></P>

<DIV id="id_3_1">
<P class="p32 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">1.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft34">Vid tillÃ¤mpningen av detta avtal avser uttrycket â€person med hemvist i en avtalsslutande statâ€ person som enligt lagstiftningen i denna stat Ã¤r skattskyldig dÃ¤r pÃ¥ grund av domicil, bosÃ¤ttning, plats fÃ¶r fÃ¶retagsledning eller annan liknande omstÃ¤ndighet och innefattar ocksÃ¥ denna stat, dess offentligrÃ¤ttsliga organ eller institutioner, politiska eller administrativa underavdelningar och lokala myndigheter. Detta uttryck inbegriper emellertid inte person som Ã¤r skattskyldig i denna stat endast fÃ¶r inkomst frÃ¥n kÃ¤lla i denna stat. Uttrycket inbegriper emellertid dessutom svenskt handelsbolag, dock endast i den utstrÃ¤ckning handelsbolagets inkomst Ã¤r skattepliktig i Sverige pÃ¥ samma sÃ¤tt som inkomst som fÃ¶rvÃ¤rvas av en person med hemvist dÃ¤r, antingen hos handelsbolaget eller hos dess delÃ¤gare.</SPAN></P>
</DIV>
<DIV id="id_3_2">
<P class="p93 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">1.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft34">For the purposes of this Convention, the term â€resident of a Contracting Stateâ€ means any person who, under the laws of that State, is liable to tax therein by reason of his domicile, residence, place of management or any other criterion of a similar nature, and also includes that State, any governmental body or agency, political or administrative subdivision or local authority thereof. But this term does not include any person who is liable to tax in that State in respect only of income from sources in that State. However, this term applies also in the case of a Swedish partnership, but only to the extent that the income derived by such partnership is subject to tax in Sweden as the income of a resident, either in its hands or in the hands of its partners.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p94 ft2">9</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV id="page_10">


<DIV id="id_1">
<DIV id="id_1_1">
<P class="p95 ft6">Prop. 2019/20:5 2. DÃ¥ pÃ¥ grund av bestÃ¤mmelserna i punkt 1 fysisk person har hemvist i bÃ¥da avtalsslutande staterna, bestÃ¤ms hans hemvist pÃ¥ fÃ¶ljande sÃ¤tt:</P>
<P class="p96 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">a)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft17">han anses ha hemvist endast i den stat dÃ¤r han har en bostad som stadigvarande stÃ¥r till hans fÃ¶rfogande. Om han har en sÃ¥dan bostad i bÃ¥da staterna, anses han ha hemvist endast i den stat med vilken hans personliga och ekonomiska fÃ¶rbindelser Ã¤r starkast (centrum fÃ¶r levnadsintressena);</SPAN></P>
<P class="p96 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">b)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft17">om det inte kan avgÃ¶ras i vilken stat han har centrum fÃ¶r sina levnadsintressen eller om han inte i nÃ¥gondera staten har en bostad som stadigvarande stÃ¥r till hans fÃ¶rfogande, anses han ha hemvist endast i den stat dÃ¤r han stadigvarande vistas;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p97 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">c)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft17">om han stadigvarande vistas i bÃ¥da staterna eller om han inte vistas stadigvarande i nÃ¥gon av dem, anses han ha hemvist endast i den stat dÃ¤r han Ã¤r medborgare;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p98 ft6"><SPAN class="ft2">d)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft18">om han Ã¤r medborgare i bÃ¥da staterna eller om han inte Ã¤r medborgare i nÃ¥gon av dem, skall de behÃ¶riga myndigheterna i de avtalsslutande staterna avgÃ¶ra frÃ¥gan genom Ã¶msesidig Ã¶verenskommelse.</SPAN></P>
</DIV>
<DIV id="id_1_2">
<P class="p99 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">2.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft17">Where by reason of the provisions of paragraph 1 an individual is a resident of both Contracting States, then his status shall be determined as follows:</SPAN></P>
<P class="p100 ft2">a) he shall be deemed to be a resident only of the State in which he has a permanent home available to him; if he has a permanent home available to him in both States, he shall be deemed to be a resident only of the State with which his personal and economic relations are closer (centre of vital interests);</P>
<P class="p101 ft6">b) if the State in which he has his centre of vital interests cannot be determined, or if he has not a permanent home available to him in either State, he shall be deemed to be a resident only of the State in which he has an habitual abode;</P>
<P class="p102 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">c)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft17">if he has an habitual abode in both States or in neither of them, he shall be deemed to be a resident only of the State of which he is a national;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p103 ft6"><SPAN class="ft2">d)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft18">if he is a national of both States or of neither of them, the competent authorities of the Contracting States shall settle the question by mutual agreement.</SPAN></P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV id="id_2">
<DIV id="id_2_1">
<P class="p99 ft6"><SPAN class="ft2">3.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft18">DÃ¥ pÃ¥ grund av bestÃ¤mmelserna i punkt 1 annan person Ã¤n fysisk person har hemvist i bÃ¥da avtalsslutande staterna, skall de behÃ¶riga myndigheterna sÃ¶ka avgÃ¶ra frÃ¥gan genom Ã¶msesidig Ã¶verenskommelse.</SPAN></P>
</DIV>
<DIV id="id_2_2">
<P class="p99 ft6"><SPAN class="ft2">3.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft18">Where by reason of the provisions of paragraph 1 a person other than an individual is a resident of both Contracting States, the competent authorities of the Contracting States shall endeavour to settle the question by mutual agreement.</SPAN></P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV id="id_3">
<P class="p28 ft2">10</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>

<P class="p105 ft2">a) plats fÃ¶r fÃ¶retagsledning, b) filial,</P>
<P class="p106 ft2">c) kontor, d) fabrik,</P>
<P class="p107 ft2">e) verkstad, och</P>
<P class="p108 ft6">f) gruva, olje- eller gaskÃ¤lla, stenbrott eller annan plats fÃ¶r utvinning av naturtillgÃ¥ngar.</P>
<P class="p72 ft6"><SPAN class="ft2">3.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft38">Plats fÃ¶r </SPAN><NOBR>byggnads-,</NOBR> anlÃ¤ggnings- eller installationsverksamhet utgÃ¶r fast driftstÃ¤lle endast om verksamheten pÃ¥gÃ¥r lÃ¤ngre tid Ã¤n tolv mÃ¥nader.</P>
<P class="p109 ft6"><SPAN class="ft2">4.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft33">Utan hinder av fÃ¶regÃ¥ende bestÃ¤mmelser i denna artikel anses uttrycket â€fast driftstÃ¤lleâ€ inte innefatta:</SPAN></P>
<P class="p73 ft2">a) anvÃ¤ndningen av anordningar uteslutande fÃ¶r lagring, utstÃ¤llning eller utlÃ¤mnande av fÃ¶retaget tillhÃ¶riga varor,</P>

<P class="p73 ft6">c) innehavet av ett fÃ¶retaget tillhÃ¶rigt varulager uteslutande fÃ¶r bearbetning eller fÃ¶rÃ¤dling genom annat fÃ¶retags fÃ¶rsorg,</P>
<P class="p73 ft4">d) innehavet av stadigvarande plats fÃ¶r affÃ¤rsverksamhet uteslutande fÃ¶r inkÃ¶p av varor eller</P>

<DIV id="id_2_2">
<P class="p110 ft6"><SPAN class="ft2">1.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft33">For the purposes of this Convention, the term â€œpermanent establishmentâ€ means a fixed place of business through which the business of an enterprise is wholly or partly carried on.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p111 ft4"><SPAN class="ft2">2.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft37">The term â€œpermanent establishmentâ€ includes especially:</SPAN></P>
<P class="p107 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">a)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft17">a place of management;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p107 ft2">b) a branch;</P>
<P class="p107 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">c)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft17">an office;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p107 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">d)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft34">a factory;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p107 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">e)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft17">a workshop; and</SPAN></P>
<P class="p112 ft6"><SPAN class="ft2">f)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft33">a mine, an oil or gas well, a quarry or any other place of extraction of natural resources.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p113 ft6"><SPAN class="ft2">3.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft33">A building site or construction or installation project constitutes a permanent establishment only if it lasts more than twelve months.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p114 ft6"><SPAN class="ft2">4.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft33">Notwithstanding the preceding provisions of this Article, the term â€œpermanent establishmentâ€ shall be deemed not to include:</SPAN></P>
<P class="p110 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">a)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft17">the use of facilities solely for the purpose of storage, display or delivery of goods or merchandise belonging to the enterprise;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p115 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">b)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft34">the maintenance of a stock of goods or merchandise belonging to the enterprise solely for the purpose of storage, display or delivery;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p115 ft36"><SPAN class="ft16">c)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft39">the maintenance of a stock of goods or merchandise belonging to the enterprise solely for the purpose of processing by another enterprise;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p110 ft4"><SPAN class="ft2">d)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft37">the maintenance of a fixed place of business solely for the purpose of purchasing goods or</SPAN></P>

<P class="p149 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">8.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft17">The fact that a company which is a resident of a Contracting State controls or is controlled by a company which is a resident of the other Contracting State, or which carries on business in that other State (whether through a permanent establishment or otherwise), shall not of itself constitute either company a permanent establishment of the other.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p150 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">9.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft34">For the purposes of this Article, an enterprise is closely related to an enterprise if, based on all the relevant facts and circumstances, one has control of the other or both are under the control of the same persons or enterprises. <P class="p156 ft6"><SPAN class="ft2">4.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft33">BestÃ¤mmelserna i punkterna 1 och 3 tillÃ¤mpas Ã¤ven pÃ¥ inkomst av fast egendom som tillhÃ¶r fÃ¶retag och pÃ¥ inkomst av fast egendom som anvÃ¤nds vid sjÃ¤lvstÃ¤ndig yrkesutÃ¶vning.</SPAN></P>

<DIV id="id_2_2">
<P class="p32 ft6"><SPAN class="ft2">3.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft33">The provisions of paragraph 1 shall apply to income derived from the direct use, letting, or use in any other form of immovable property.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p157 ft2">The provisions of paragraph 1 shall also apply to income from movable property or income derived from services connected with the use or the right to use immovable property which, under the taxation law of the Contracting State in which the property in question is situated, is assimilated to income from immovable property.</P>
<P class="p158 ft6"><SPAN class="ft2">4.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft33">The provisions of paragraphs 1 and 3 shall also apply to the income from immovable property of an enterprise and to income from immovable property used for the performance of independent personal services.</SPAN></P>

<P class="p160 ft16"><SPAN class="ft2">2.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft46">Om fÃ¶retag i en avtalsslutande stat bedriver rÃ¶relse i den andra avtalsslutande staten frÃ¥n dÃ¤r belÃ¤get fast driftstÃ¤lle hÃ¤nfÃ¶rs, om inte bestÃ¤mmelserna i punkt 3 fÃ¶ranleder annat, i vardera avtalsslutande staten till det fasta driftstÃ¤llet den inkomst som det kan antas att driftstÃ¤llet skulle ha fÃ¶rvÃ¤rvat, om det varit ett fristÃ¥ende fÃ¶retag, som bedrivit verksamhet av samma eller liknande slag under samma eller liknande villkor och sjÃ¤lvstÃ¤ndigt avslutat affÃ¤rer med det fÃ¶retag till vilket driftstÃ¤llet hÃ¶r.</SPAN></P>

<DIV id="id_2_2">
<P class="p99 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">1.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft17">The profits of an enterprise of a Contracting State shall be taxable only in that State unless the enterprise carries on business in the other Contracting State through a permanent establishment situated therein. If the enterprise carries on business as aforesaid, the profits of the enterprise may be taxed in the other State but only so much of them as is attributable to that permanent establishment.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p160 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">2.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft17">Subject to the provisions of paragraph 3, where an enterprise of a Contracting State carries on business in the other Contracting State through a permanent establishment situated therein, there shall in each Contracting State be attributed to that permanent establishment the profits which it might be expected to make if it were a distinct and separate enterprise engaged in the same or similar activities under the same or similar conditions and dealing wholly independently with the enterprise of which it is a permanent establishment.</SPAN></P>

<P class="p163 ft6"><SPAN class="ft2">6.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft33">Where profits include items of income which are dealt with separately in other Articles of this Convention, then the provisions of those Articles shall not be affected by the provisions of this Article.</SPAN></P>

<P class="p170 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">2.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft17">I fall dÃ¥ en avtalsslutande stat i inkomsten fÃ¶r ett fÃ¶retag i denna stat inrÃ¤knar â€“ och i Ã¶verensstÃ¤mmelse dÃ¤rmed beskattar â€“ inkomst, fÃ¶r vilken ett fÃ¶retag i den andra avtalsslutande staten beskattats i denna andra stat, samt den sÃ¥lunda inrÃ¤knade inkomsten Ã¤r sÃ¥dan som skulle ha tillkommit fÃ¶retaget i den fÃ¶rstnÃ¤mnda staten om de villkor som avtalats mellan fÃ¶retagen hade varit sÃ¥dana som skulle ha avtalats mellan av varandra oberoende fÃ¶retag, skall denna andra stat genomfÃ¶ra vederbÃ¶rlig justering av det skattebelopp som pÃ¥fÃ¶rts fÃ¶r inkomsten dÃ¤r om denna andra stat finner justeringen berÃ¤ttigad. Vid sÃ¥dan justering iakttas Ã¶vriga bestÃ¤mmelser i detta avtal och de behÃ¶riga myndigheterna i de avtalsslutande staterna Ã¶verlÃ¤gger vid behov med varandra.</SPAN></P>

<DIV id="id_1_2">
<P class="p32 ft2">and in either case conditions are made or imposed between the two enterprises in their commercial or financial relations which differ from those which would be made between independent enterprises, then any profits which would, but for those conditions, have accrued to one of the enterprises, but, by reason of those conditions, have not so accrued, may be included in the profits of that enterprise and taxed accordingly.</P>
<P class="p160 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">2.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft17">Where a Contracting State includes in the profits of an enterprise of that State â€“ and taxes accordingly â€“ profits on which an enterprise of the other Contracting State has been charged to tax in that other State and the profits so included are profits which would have accrued to the enterprise of the </SPAN><NOBR>first-mentioned</NOBR> State if the conditions made between the two enterprises had been those which would have been made between independent enterprises, then that other State shall make an appropriate adjustment to the amount of the tax charged therein on those profits where that other State considers the adjustment justified. <P class="p28 ft24">Article 10</P>
<P class="p67 ft3">Dividends</P>
<P class="p152 ft6"><SPAN class="ft2">1.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft18">Dividends paid by a company which is a resident of a Contracting State to a resident of the other Contracting State may be taxed in that other State.</SPAN></P>

<P class="p155 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">2.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft34">Utdelningen fÃ¥r emellertid beskattas Ã¤ven i den avtalsslutande stat dÃ¤r bolaget som betalar utdelningen har hemvist, enligt lagstiftningen i denna stat, men om den som har rÃ¤tt till utdelningen har hemvist i den andra avtalsslutande staten fÃ¥r skatten inte Ã¶verstiga 10 procent av utdelningens bruttobelopp.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p171 ft16">BestÃ¤mmelserna i fÃ¶regÃ¥ende mening skall inte tillÃ¤mpas pÃ¥ utdelning som betalas av ett bolag med hemvist i en avtalsslutande stat till ett bolag med hemvist i den andra avtalsslutande staten pÃ¥ vilka bestÃ¤mmelserna i Direktivet om ett gemensamt beskattningssystem fÃ¶r moderbolag och dotterbolag hemmahÃ¶rande i olika medlemsstater (2011/96/EU) i den lydelse det framdeles kan fÃ¥ genom att Ã¤ndras, Ã¤r tillÃ¤mpliga.<SPAN class="ft47">6</SPAN></P>
<P class="p172 ft6">De behÃ¶riga myndigheterna i de avtalsslutande staterna kan trÃ¤ffa Ã¶verenskommelse om sÃ¤ttet att genomfÃ¶ra dessa begrÃ¤nsningar.</P>
<P class="p155 ft6">BestÃ¤mmelserna i denna punkt berÃ¶r inte bolagets beskattning fÃ¶r den vinst av vilken utdelningen betalas.</P>
<P class="p173 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">3.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft34">Med uttrycket â€utdelningâ€ fÃ¶rstÃ¥s i denna artikel inkomst av aktier, andelsbevis eller andra liknande bevis, gruvaktier, stiftarandelar eller andra rÃ¤ttigheter, som inte Ã¤r fordringar, med rÃ¤tt till andel i vinst, samt inkomst av andra andelar i bolag, som enligt lagstiftningen i den stat dÃ¤r det utdelande bolaget har hemvist vid beskattningen behandlas pÃ¥ samma sÃ¤tt som inkomst av aktier.</SPAN></P>
</DIV>
<DIV id="id_1_2">
<P class="p174 ft6">2. However, such dividends may Prop. 2019/20:5 also be taxed in the Contracting</P>
<P class="p175 ft2">State of which the company paying the dividends is a resident, and according to the laws of that State, but if the beneficial owner of the dividends is a resident of the other Contracting State, the tax so charged shall not exceed 10 per cent of the gross amount of the dividends.</P>
<P class="p176 ft2">The provisions of the previous sentence shall not apply with respect to dividends paid by a company which is a resident of a Contracting State to a company which is a resident of the other Contracting State with respect to which the provisions of the Directive on the common system of taxation applicable in the case of parent companies and subsidiaries of different Member States (2011/96/EU) as it may be changed from time to time, are applicable.</P>
<P class="p177 ft6">The competent authorities of the Contracting States may by mutual agreement settle the mode of application of this limitation.</P>
<P class="p178 ft6">This paragraph shall not affect the taxation of the company in respect of the profits out of which the dividends are paid.</P>
<P class="p92 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">3.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft34">The term â€dividendsâ€ as used in this Article means income from shares, â€jouissanceâ€ shares or â€jouissanceâ€ rights, mining shares, foundersâ€™ shares or other rights, not being </SPAN><NOBR>debt-claims,</NOBR> participating in profits, as well as income from other corporate rights which is subjected to the same taxation treatment as income from shares by the laws of the State of which the company making the distribution is a resident.</P>

<DIV id="id_1_1">
<P class="p179 ft6">Prop. 2019/20:5 Uttrycket â€utdelningâ€ i denna artikel innefattar ocksÃ¥ vinst som betalas genom ett arrangemang med andel i vinst (associaÃ§Ã£o em participaÃ§Ã£o).</P>
<P class="p180 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">4.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft17">BestÃ¤mmelserna i punkterna 1 och 2 tillÃ¤mpas inte, om den som har rÃ¤tt till utdelningen har hemvist i en avtalsslutande stat och bedriver rÃ¶relse i den andra avtalsslutande staten, dÃ¤r bolaget som betalar utdelningen har hemvist, frÃ¥n dÃ¤r belÃ¤get fast driftstÃ¤lle eller utÃ¶var sjÃ¤lvstÃ¤ndig yrkesverksamhet i denna andra stat frÃ¥n dÃ¤r belÃ¤gen stadigvarande anordning, samt den andel pÃ¥ grund av vilken utdelningen betalas Ã¤ger verkligt samband med det fasta driftstÃ¤llet eller den stadigvarande anordningen. I sÃ¥dant fall tillÃ¤mpas bestÃ¤mmelserna i artikel 7 respektive artikel 14.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p181 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">5.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft17">Om bolag med hemvist i en avtalsslutande stat fÃ¶rvÃ¤rvar inkomst frÃ¥n den andra avtalsslutande staten, fÃ¥r denna andra stat inte beskatta utdelning som bolaget betalar, utom i den mÃ¥n utdelningen betalas till person med hemvist i denna andra stat eller i den mÃ¥n den andel pÃ¥ grund av vilken utdelningen betalas Ã¤ger verkligt samband med fast driftstÃ¤lle eller stadigvarande anordning i denna andra stat, och ej heller pÃ¥ bolagets icke utdelade vinst ta ut en skatt som utgÃ¥r pÃ¥ bolagets icke utdelade vinst, Ã¤ven om utdelningen eller den icke utdelade vinsten helt eller delvis utgÃ¶rs av inkomst som uppkommit i denna andra stat.</SPAN></P>
</DIV>
<DIV id="id_1_2">
<P class="p182 ft6">The term â€dividendsâ€ as used in this Article also comprises profits paid under an arrangement for participation in profits (associaÃ§Ã£o em participaÃ§Ã£o).</P>
<P class="p183 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">4.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft17">The provisions of paragraphs 1 and 2 shall not apply if the beneficial owner of the dividends, being a resident of a Contracting State, carries on business in the other Contracting State of which the company paying the dividends is a resident, through a permanent establishment situated therein, or performs in that other State independent personal services from a fixed base situated therein, and the holding in respect of which the dividends are paid is effectively connected with such permanent establishment or fixed base. In such case the provisions of Article 7 or Article 14, as the case may be, shall apply.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p184 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">5.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft17">Where a company which is a resident of a Contracting State derives profits or income from the other Contracting State, that other State may not impose any tax on the dividends paid by the company, except insofar as such dividends are paid to a resident of that other State or insofar as the holding in respect of which the dividends are paid is effectively connected with a permanent establishment or a fixed base situated in that other State nor subject the companyâ€™s undistributed profits to a tax on the companyâ€™s undistributed profits, even if the dividends paid or the undistributed profits consist wholly or partly of profits or income arising in such other State.</SPAN></P>

<P class="p155 ft6">c) ersÃ¤ttningen inte belastar fast driftstÃ¤lle eller stadigvarande anordning som arbetsgivaren har i den andra staten.</P>
<P class="p173 ft6"><SPAN class="ft2">3.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft33">Utan hinder av fÃ¶regÃ¥ende bestÃ¤mmelser i denna artikel fÃ¥r ersÃ¤ttning fÃ¶r arbete, som utfÃ¶rs ombord pÃ¥ skepp eller luftfartyg, som anvÃ¤nds i internationell trafik av ett fÃ¶retag i en avtalsslutande stat, beskattas i denna stat.</SPAN></P>

<DIV id="id_2_2">
<P class="p32 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">1.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft34">Subject to the provisions of Articles 16, 18 and 19, salaries, wages and other similar remuneration derived by a resident of a Contracting State in respect of an employment shall be taxable only in that State unless the employment is exercised in the other Contracting State. If the employment is so exercised, such remuneration as is derived therefrom may be taxed in that other State.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p217 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">2.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft34">Notwithstanding the provisions of paragraph 1, remuneration derived by a resident of a Contracting State in respect of an employment exercised in the other Contracting State shall be taxable only in the </SPAN><NOBR>first-mentioned</NOBR> State if:</P>
<P class="p218 ft6">a) the recipient is present in the other State for a period or periods not exceeding in the aggregate 183 days in any twelve month period commencing or ending in the fiscal year concerned; and</P>
<P class="p219 ft53"><SPAN class="ft2">b)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft52">the remuneration is paid by, or on behalf of, an employer who is not a resident of the other State; and</SPAN></P>
<P class="p220 ft6"><SPAN class="ft2">c)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft18">the remuneration is not borne by a permanent establishment or a fixed base which the employer has in the other State.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p221 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">3.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft34">Notwithstanding the preceding provisions of this Article, remuneration derived in respect of an employment exercised aboard a ship or aircraft operated in international traffic by an enterprise of a Contracting State, may be taxed in that State.</SPAN></P>

<P class="p99 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">1.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft17">Utan hinder av bestÃ¤mmelserna i artiklarna 14 och 15 fÃ¥r inkomst, som person med hemvist i en avtalsslutande stat fÃ¶rvÃ¤rvar genom sin personliga verksamhet i den andra avtalsslutande staten i egenskap av underhÃ¥llningsartist, sÃ¥som teater- eller filmskÃ¥despelare, radio- eller televisionsartist eller musiker, eller i egenskap av sportutÃ¶vare, beskattas i denna andra stat.</SPAN></P>

<DIV id="id_4_2">
<P class="p99 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">1.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft17">Notwithstanding the provisions of Articles 14 and 15, income derived by a resident of a Contracting State as an entertainer, such as a theatre, motion picture, radio or television artiste, or a musician, or as an athlete, from his personal activities as such exercised in the other Contracting State, may be taxed in that other State.</SPAN></P>

<DIV id="id_5_2">
<P class="p99 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">2.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft17">Where income in respect of personal activities exercised by an entertainer or an athlete in his capacity as such accrues not to the entertainer or athlete himself but to another person, that income may, notwithstanding the provisions of Articles 7, 14 and 15, be taxed in the Contracting State in which the activities of the entertainer or athlete are exercised.</SPAN></P>

<P class="p222 ft2">1.<SPAN class="ft23">12 </SPAN>Om inte bestÃ¤mmelserna i artikel 19 punkt 2 fÃ¶ranleder annat, beskattas pension och annan liknande ersÃ¤ttning, som med anledning av tidigare anstÃ¤llning betalas till person med hemvist i en avtalsslutande stat, endast i denna stat.</P>
<P class="p223 ft2">2.<SPAN class="ft23">13 </SPAN>Utan hinder av bestÃ¤mmelserna i punkt 1 fÃ¥r pension och liknande ersÃ¤ttning med anledning av tidigare anstÃ¤llning, som hÃ¤rrÃ¶r frÃ¥n en avtalsslutande stat och som betalas till person med hemvist i den andra avtalsslutande staten, beskattas i den fÃ¶rstnÃ¤mnda staten. SÃ¥dan pension och liknande ersÃ¤ttning ska anses hÃ¤rrÃ¶ra frÃ¥n en avtalsslutande stat om premier eller betalningar avseende sÃ¥dan inkomst fÃ¥r dras av vid beskattningen i den staten.</P>

<DIV id="id_2_2">
<P class="p32 ft6"><SPAN class="ft2">1.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft38">Subject to the provisions of paragraph 2 of Article 19, pensions and other similar remuneration paid to a resident of a Contracting State in consideration of past employment shall be taxable only in that State.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p219 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">2.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft54">Notwithstanding the provisions of paragraph 1, pensions and other similar remuneration in consideration of past employment arising in a Contracting State and paid to a resident of the other Contracting State may be taxed in the firstmentioned State. Such pensions and other similar remuneration shall be deemed to arise in a Contracting State insofar as the contributions or payments associated with such item of income qualify for relief from tax in that State.</SPAN></P>

<P class="p248 ft2">1.<SPAN class="ft23">14 </SPAN>Med beaktande av bestÃ¤mmelserna i portugisisk lagstiftning betrÃ¤ffande undanrÃ¶jande av internationell dubbelbeskattning (som inte pÃ¥verkar den allmÃ¤nna principen som hÃ¤r anges), ska betrÃ¤ffande Portugal dubbelbeskattning undanrÃ¶jas pÃ¥ fÃ¶ljande sÃ¤tt:</P>
<P class="p249 ft16"><SPAN class="ft2">a)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft46">Om person med hemvist i Portugal fÃ¶rvÃ¤rvar inkomst som enligt bestÃ¤mmelserna i detta avtal fÃ¥r beskattas i Sverige (fÃ¶rutom i den omfattning som dessa bestÃ¤mmelser medger beskattning i Sverige endast pÃ¥ grund av att inkomsten Ã¤r fÃ¶rvÃ¤rvad av en person med hemvist i Sverige), ska Portugal frÃ¥n skatten pÃ¥ denna persons inkomst avrÃ¤kna ett belopp motsvarande den skatt som betalats i Sverige. AvrÃ¤kningsbeloppet ska emellertid inte Ã¶verstiga den del av inkomstskatten, berÃ¤knad utan sÃ¥dan avrÃ¤kning, som belÃ¶per pÃ¥ den inkomst som fÃ¥r beskattas i Sverige.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p250 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">b)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft17">Om person med hemvist i Portugal fÃ¶rvÃ¤rvar inkomst som enligt bestÃ¤mmelserna i detta avtal Ã¤r undantagen frÃ¥n beskattning i Portugal, fÃ¥r Portugal vid faststÃ¤llandet av skatteuttaget fÃ¶r Ã¥terstÃ¥ende inkomst fÃ¶r sÃ¥dan person beakta den inkomst som undantagits frÃ¥n beskattning.</SPAN></P>
</DIV>
<DIV id="id_2_2">
<P class="p99 ft6"><SPAN class="ft2">1.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft18">Subject to the provisions of Portuguese law regarding the elimination of international double taxation (which shall not affect the general principle hereof), double taxation shall be eliminated in the case Portugal as follows:</SPAN></P>
<P class="p102 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">a)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft17">Where a resident of Portugal derives income which may be taxed in Sweden in accordance with the provisions of this Convention (except to the extent that these provisions allow taxation by Sweden solely because the income is also income derived by a resident of Sweden), Portugal shall allow, as a deduction from the tax on the income of that resident, an amount equal to the income tax paid in Sweden. Such deduction shall not, however, exceed that part of the income tax, as computed before the deduction is given, which is attributable to the income which may be taxed in Sweden;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p251 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">b)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft17">Where in accordance with any provision of the Convention income derived by a resident of Portugal is exempt from tax in Portugal, Portugal may nevertheless, in calculating the amount of tax on the remaining income of such resident, take into account the exempted income.</SPAN></P>
</DIV>
</DIV>

<P class="p155 ft6"><SPAN class="ft2">2.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft33">BetrÃ¤ffande Sverige skall dubbelbeskattning undvikas pÃ¥ fÃ¶ljande sÃ¤tt:</SPAN></P>
<P class="p155 ft2">a) Om person med hemvist i Sverige fÃ¶rvÃ¤rvar inkomst som enligt portugisisk lagstiftning och i enlighet med bestÃ¤mmelserna i detta avtal fÃ¥r beskattas i Portugal, skall Sverige â€“ med beaktande av bestÃ¤mmelserna i svensk lagstiftning betrÃ¤ffande avrÃ¤kning av utlÃ¤ndsk skatt (Ã¤ven i den lydelse de framdeles kan fÃ¥ genom att Ã¤ndras utan att den allmÃ¤nna princip som anges hÃ¤r Ã¤ndras) â€“ frÃ¥n den svenska skatten pÃ¥ inkomsten avrÃ¤kna ett belopp motsvarande den portugisiska skatt som erlagts pÃ¥ inkomsten.</P>
<P class="p213 ft16">b) Om person med hemvist i Sverige fÃ¶rvÃ¤rvar inkomst som enligt bestÃ¤mmelserna i detta avtal beskattas endast i Portugal, fÃ¥r Sverige vid faststÃ¤llandet av skattesatsen fÃ¶r svensk progressiv skatt beakta den inkomst som skall beskattas endast i Portugal.</P>
<P class="p156 ft6"><SPAN class="ft2">c)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft18">Utan hinder av bestÃ¤mmelserna i a) ovan Ã¤r utdelning frÃ¥n bolag med hemvist i Portugal till bolag med hemvist i Sverige undantagen frÃ¥n svensk skatt enligt bestÃ¤mmelserna i svensk lag om skattebefrielse fÃ¶r utdelning som betalas till svenska bolag frÃ¥n bolag i utlandet.</SPAN></P>
</DIV>
<DIV id="id_1_2">
<P class="p68 ft6">2. In the case of Sweden, double Prop. 2019/20:5 taxation shall be avoided as</P>
<P class="p28 ft2">follows:</P>
<P class="p112 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">a)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft17">Where a resident of Sweden derives income which under the laws of Portugal and in accordance with the provisions of this Convention may be taxed in Portugal, Sweden shall allow â€“ subject to the provisions of the laws of Sweden concerning credit for foreign tax (as it may be amended from time to time without changing the general principle hereof) â€“ as a deduction from the tax on such income, an amount equal to the Portuguese tax paid in respect of such income.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p252 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">b)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft34">Where a resident of Sweden derives income which, in accordance with the provisions of this Convention, shall be taxable only in Portugal, Sweden may, when determining the graduated rate of Swedish tax, take into account the income which shall be taxable only in Portugal.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p253 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">c)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft17">Notwithstanding the provisions of </SPAN><NOBR>sub-paragraph</NOBR> a) of this paragraph, dividends paid by a company which is a resident of Portugal to a company which is a resident of Sweden shall be exempt from Swedish tax according to the provisions of Swedish law governing the exemption of tax on dividends paid to Swedish companies by companies abroad.</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>

<P class="p28 ft3"><NOBR>Non-discrimination</NOBR></P>
<P class="p152 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">1.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft17">Nationals of a Contracting State shall not be subjected in the other Contracting State to any taxation or any requirement connected therewith, which is other or more burdensome than the taxation and connected requirements to which nationals of that other State in the same circumstances are or may be subjected. This provision shall, notwithstanding the provisions of Article 1, also apply to persons who are not residents of one or both of the Contracting States.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p254 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">2.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft17">The taxation on a permanent establishment which an enterprise of a Contracting State has in the other Contracting State shall not be less favourably levied in that other State than the taxation levied on enterprises of that other State carrying on the same activities. This provision shall not be construed as obliging a Contracting State to grant to residents of the other Contracting State any personal allowances, reliefs and reductions for taxation purposes on</SPAN></P>

<P class="p157 ft16"><SPAN class="ft2">3.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft45">Utom i de fall dÃ¥ bestÃ¤mmelserna i artikel 9 punkt 1, artikel 11 punkt 7 eller artikel 12 punkt 6 tillÃ¤mpas, Ã¤r rÃ¤nta, royalty och annan betalning frÃ¥n fÃ¶retag i en avtalsslutande stat till person med hemvist i den andra avtalsslutande staten avdragsgilla vid bestÃ¤mmandet av den beskattningsbara inkomsten fÃ¶r sÃ¥dant fÃ¶retag pÃ¥ samma villkor som betalning till person med hemvist i den fÃ¶rstnÃ¤mnda staten. PÃ¥ samma sÃ¤tt Ã¤r skuld som fÃ¶retag i en avtalsslutande stat har till person med hemvist i den andra avtalsslutande staten avdragsgill vid bestÃ¤mmandet av sÃ¥dant fÃ¶retags beskattningsbara fÃ¶rmÃ¶genhet pÃ¥ samma villkor som skuld till person med hemvist i den fÃ¶rstnÃ¤mnda staten.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p256 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">4.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft34">FÃ¶retag i en avtalsslutande stat, vars kapital helt eller delvis Ã¤gs eller kontrolleras, direkt eller indirekt, av en eller flera personer med hemvist i den andra avtalsslutande staten, skall inte i den fÃ¶rstnÃ¤mnda staten bli fÃ¶remÃ¥l fÃ¶r beskattning eller dÃ¤rmed sammanhÃ¤ngande krav som Ã¤r av annat slag eller mer tyngande Ã¤n den beskattning och dÃ¤rmed sammanhÃ¤ngande krav som annat liknande fÃ¶retag i den fÃ¶rstnÃ¤mnda staten Ã¤r eller kan bli underkastat.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p257 ft6"><SPAN class="ft2">5.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft33">Utan hinder av bestÃ¤mmelserna i artikel 2 tillÃ¤mpas bestÃ¤mmelserna i denna artikel pÃ¥ skatter av varje slag och beskaffenhet.</SPAN></P>

<P class="p140 ft2">its own residents.</P>
<P class="p258 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">3.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft34">Except where the provisions of paragraph 1 of Article 9, paragraph 7 of Article 11, or paragraph 6 of Article 12, apply, interest, royalties and other disbursements paid by an enterprise of a Contracting State to a resident of the other Contracting State shall, for the purpose of determining the taxable profits of such enterprise, be deductible under the same conditions as if they had been paid to a resident of the </SPAN><NOBR>first-mentioned</NOBR> State. Similarly, any debts of an enterprise of a Contracting State to a resident of the other Contracting State shall, for the purpose of determining the taxable capital of such enterprise, be deductible under the same conditions as if they had been contracted to a resident of the firstmentioned State.</P>
<P class="p259 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">4.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft34">Enterprises of a Contracting State, the capital of which is wholly or partly owned or controlled, directly or indirectly, by one or more residents of the other Contracting State, shall not be subjected in the </SPAN><NOBR>first-mentioned</NOBR> State to any taxation or any requirement connected therewith which is other or more burdensome than the taxation and connected requirements to which other similar enterprises of the <NOBR>first-mentioned</NOBR> State are or may be subjected.</P>
<P class="p260 ft6"><SPAN class="ft2">5.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft33">The provisions of this Article shall, notwithstanding the provisions of Article 2, apply to taxes of every kind and description.</SPAN></P>

<P class="p299 ft2">This Convention shall remain in force until terminated by a Contracting State. <P class="p155 ft2">I artikel 18 i den modell som Organisationen fÃ¶r ekonomiskt samarbete och utveckling (OECD) har tagit fram fÃ¶r bilaterala skatteavtal (â€Model Tax Convention on Income and on Capitalâ€) anges att pension frÃ¥n tidigare enskild anstÃ¤llning endast ska beskattas i hemviststaten. Sverige hade under lÃ¥ng tid en reservation mot den artikeln i syfte att tydliggÃ¶ra den svenska avtalspolicyn. Sedan 2005 framgÃ¥r dock av kommentaren till OECD:s modellavtal att kÃ¤llstatsbeskattning Ã¤r ett likvÃ¤rdigt alternativ till hemviststatsbeskattning.
